basicInfo.name: Pizza Hut

items.name: Cheesy-Choco Comfort Combo

items.name: Mexican Fiesta Thin n Crispy
items.description: New Thin n Crispy crust topped with red capsicum, green capsicum, jalapeno, onion, black olives, sweet corn, 100% mozzarella cheese, signature spice sprinkle & our flavourful pan sauce (TnC-258 Kcal/100g). Contains Cereals containing Gluten (Wheat), Soya and Milk & Milk Products.
